ygData.subject: RE: Mask of Deception and ultravision
ygData.msgSnippet: Exactly.  Sneaking appears to be the same as invisibility which definitely works this way. Kit ... From: kim@stormhaven.org [mailto:kim@stormhaven.org] Sent:
ygData.messageBody:
Exactly. Sneaking appears to be the same as invisibility which definitely
works this way.

Kit

-----Original Message-----
From: kim@... [mailto:kim@...]
Sent: Wednesday, February 02, 2000 2:48 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Mask of Deception and ultravision


From: <kim@...>

On Wed, 2 Feb 2000, Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4 wrote:
>
> You would sing carillon first before sneaking. The faction bonus it gives
> lasts until you zone. You then either activate illusion or sneak. I'm
> almost 100% certain the illusion will give you a better /con than sneaking
> so thats the best way to go.

I'm pretty sure sneaking just sets you to indifferent with a
merchant regardless of faction (it's really a bug that you can
use it at all to shop). So if illusion+song results in higher
than indifferent faction, it will be better than
sneak+anything else.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
